product_short_description: Flagship smartphone with Tensor SoC, 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, and advanced camera system.
product_long_description: Capture stunning moments and experience pure Android with the Google Pixel 6 Pro. Featuring the custom Tensor SoC, a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, and an advanced camera system, it's designed for photography enthusiasts and Android aficionados.
product_highlights: 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals
Tensor SoC for AI-driven performance and photography enhancements
Triple camera system with 50MP main sensor, 12MP ultra-wide, and 48MP telephoto
4K video recording at 60fps and 8K at 30fps for high-quality video capture
IP68 water and dust resistance for durability in various environments
Android 12 with guaranteed updates for a secure and up-to-date experience

product_short_description: Smart display with 7-inch touchscreen, Google Assistant, and sleep sensing technology.
product_long_description: Transform your home with the Google Nest Hub (2nd Gen). With a vibrant 7-inch touchscreen, built-in Google Assistant, and sleep sensing technology, it's a versatile addition to your smart home ecosystem.
product_highlights: 7-inch touchscreen for easy navigation and control of smart home devices
Voice-activated Google Assistant for hands-free tasks and queries
Sleep Sensing technology to monitor and analyze your sleep patterns
Stream music, videos, and more from popular streaming services
Compatible with a wide range of smart home devices for seamless automation
Ambient EQ for adjusting display brightness and color temperature based on the environment

product_short_description: Ultra-light Chromebook with 13.3-inch touchscreen, backlit keyboard, and up to 12 hours of battery life.
product_long_description: Stay productive on the go with the Google Pixelbook Go. Featuring an ultra-light design, a 13.3-inch touchscreen, and a backlit keyboard, it's the perfect Chromebook for work, entertainment, and creativity.
product_highlights: Ultra-light and thin design for portability and on-the-go productivity
13.3-inch Full HD touchscreen for a responsive and immersive experience
Quiet and comfortable backlit keyboard for efficient typing in any environment
Up to 12 hours of battery life for all-day usage without the need for charging
Titan C security chip for enhanced device and data security
Fast charging capabilities with up to 2 hours of use from a 20-minute charge

product_short_description: Affordable and high-quality wireless earbuds with rich sound and hands-free Google Assistant.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in clear and rich sound with the Google Pixel Buds A-Series. These affordable wireless earbuds offer hands-free access to Google Assistant and a comfortable, secure fit for all-day use.
product_highlights: Rich and immersive sound quality for an enjoyable listening experience
Passive noise reduction for minimizing ambient sounds in your environment
Hands-free access to Google Assistant for convenient voice commands
Stylish and secure fit with an in-ear design and stabilizer arc
Sweat and water-resistant design for durability during workouts and outdoor activities
Intuitive touch controls for music playback, calls, and accessing Assistant

product_short_description: Streaming device with 4K HDR support, Google TV interface, and voice remote for easy content discovery.
product_long_description: Upgrade your entertainment experience with the Google Chromecast with Google TV. Featuring 4K HDR support, the Google TV interface, and a voice remote, it's the perfect companion for streaming your favorite shows and movies.
product_highlights: Supports streaming in 4K HDR for stunning and detailed visuals
Google TV interface for easy content discovery and personalized recommendations
Voice remote with dedicated buttons for quick access to popular streaming services
Chromecast built-in for casting content from your phone, tablet, or computer
Access to a wide range of streaming apps and services for diverse content options
Compact and easy-to-install design for a seamless streaming experience

product_short_description: Smart video doorbell with HD camera, 24/7 streaming, and facial recognition for enhanced home security.
product_long_description: Enhance your home security with the Google Nest Hello Video Doorbell. With an HD camera, 24/7 streaming, and facial recognition, it provides a comprehensive view of your doorstep and keeps you informed about who's at your door.
product_highlights: HD camera with 160-degree field of view for a clear and wide perspective
24/7 streaming and video recording for real-time and recorded footage
Facial recognition for personalized alerts about familiar faces at your door
HDR and night vision for clear footage in various lighting conditions
Two-way audio for communication with visitors via the Nest app
Integration with Google Assistant for voice-controlled features and alerts

product_short_description: Smart thermostat with energy-saving features, remote control, and compatibility with major smart home platforms.
product_long_description: Take control of your home's climate with the Google Nest Thermostat. Featuring energy-saving capabilities, remote control via the Nest app, and compatibility with major smart home platforms, it's a sleek and intelligent addition to your home.
product_highlights: Sleek design with a vibrant display for easy temperature adjustments
Energy-saving features to optimize heating and cooling based on your preferences
Remote control via the Nest app for adjusting settings from anywhere
Compatibility with major smart home platforms, including Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa
Early-On feature for pre-heating or pre-cooling to reach desired temperatures at scheduled times
Monthly energy usage reports for insights into your heating and cooling patterns

product_short_description: Indoor security camera with 1080p HD video, two-way audio, and intelligent alerts for home monitoring.
product_long_description: Keep an eye on your home with the Google Nest Cam Indoor. Featuring 1080p HD video, two-way audio, and intelligent alerts, it provides reliable and convenient home monitoring, whether you're at home or away.
product_highlights: 1080p HD video with a 130-degree wide-angle view for detailed and broad coverage
Two-way audio for communication with people at home via the Nest app
Intelligent alerts for motion and sound detection with customizable activity zones
Night vision for clear footage in low-light conditions
Cloud storage options for video history and event playback
Integration with Google Assistant for voice commands and alerts

product_short_description: Wireless charger with Pixel Stand AI features, fast charging, and ambient light sensing.
product_long_description: Charge your Pixel device with the Google Pixel Stand (2nd Gen). With fast wireless charging, Pixel Stand AI features, and ambient light sensing, it transforms your charging experience into a convenient and intelligent daily routine.
product_highlights: Fast wireless charging for Pixel devices with Qi-compatible technology
Pixel Stand AI features for personalized notifications, alarms, and more
Ambient light sensing for adjusting display brightness based on your environment
Landscape and portrait orientation support for versatile device placement
USB-C port for wired charging of other devices, such as headphones or smartwatches
Ideal for use on bedside tables, desks, or other convenient locations
